Headline: #49 Western Temporary Reroute at Western/Harrison
ShortDescription: 49 Western buses are temporarily rerouted via Western, Harrison, Oakley, Polk and Western: due to, police activity near Western/Harrison.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#49 Western buses are temporarily rerouted via Western, Harrison, Oakley, Polk and Western: due to, police activity near Western/Harrison.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: O'Hare-bound Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier track conditions near Rosemont. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier track conditions near Rosemont

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
